abstract: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey picks consortium headed by operator of Vancouver's airport to build and operate new Central Terminal Building at La Guardia Airport.
lead_paragraph: A consortium led by the operator of Vancouver’s airport was selected to construct and operate a new Central Terminal Building at the airport in Queens.

headline.main: Port Authority Picks Group to Remake La Guardia Airport
headline.print_headline: Port Authority Picks Group to Remake La Guardia Airport

snippet: A consortium led by the operator of Vancouver’s airport was selected to construct and operate a new Central Terminal Building at the airport in Queens.
